reference.title: Host CPU acceleration: CPACF
reference.shortdesc: Only keys with a key type of DATA can be used successfully with the CPACF exploitation layer through this verb.

section.p: Specifically, a DATA key has a CV (Control Vector) of all X'00' bytes for all active bytes of the CV (eight bytes for 8-byte DES keys, 16 bytes for 16-byte DES keys, and 16 bytes for 24-byte DES keys).
